mapper.select: select c.product_no as productNo, c.user_id as userId, c.amount, c.allprice as allPrice, c.regdate, p.product_name as productName, p.product_price as price, i.img_oname as imgOname, i.img_sname as imgSname, i.img_type as imgType from cart c, users u, products p, products_img i where c.product_no = p.product_no and p.product_no = i.product_no and c.user_id = u.user_id and c.user_id = #{userId} and i.img_state = 1 order by c.regdate desc

select rnum, productNo, userId, amount, allPrice, regdate, productName, price, imgOname, imgSname, imgType from ( select rownum as rnum, productNo, userId, amount, allPrice, regdate, productName, price, imgOname, imgSname, imgType from ( select c.product_no as productNo, c.user_id as userId, c.amount, c.allprice as allPrice, c.regdate, p.product_name as productName, p.product_price as price, i.img_oname as imgOname, i.img_sname as imgSname, i.img_type as imgType from cart c, users u, products p, products_img i where c.product_no = p.product_no and p.product_no = i.product_no and c.user_id = u.user_id and i.img_state = 1 and c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.regdate desc ) where rownum <= #{pager.endRowNo} ) where rnum >= #{pager.startRowNo}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (product_no, user_id, amount, regdate, allprice) values (#{productNo}, #{userId}, #{amount}, sysdate, #{allPrice})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where product_no = #{productNo} and user_id = #{userId}
